data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
1) Chronos is a multi-module piece of software. I goes 3 levels
    deep and development versions go deeper. 2) Chronos is a mod_perl
    application, much like Slash is. It would fit under "Misc. Apache
    modules", along other mod_perl applications that have their own
    top-level namespace. 3) Chronos is not a library, does not implement
    any standard and has no interface (well, yes, it does, as does any
    module, but it's not meant to be used by a third-party).
